markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Noble Resolve](/Feats.aspx?ID=3934) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ardande" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=498" />
<trait label="Ifrit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=301" />
<trait label="Oread" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=304" />
<trait label="Suli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=310" />
<trait label="Sylph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=311" />
<trait label="Talos" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=507" />
<trait label="Undine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=314" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 31

</column>

---

Once, genies ruled vast kingdoms, and a remnant of that confidence and power is reflected in your strong will. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves against effects with the [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) trait. Regardless of success or failure, you become aware of the person who used the effect on you if they were visible to you at the time of use.
name: Noble Resolve
